title: ASML rides Nvidia's coattails with lasers and huge chip 'printers'
full_text: ASML rides Nvidia's coattails with lasers and huge chip 'printers'. As artificial intelligence firms jostle for the Nvidia chips needed to power the AI boom, Dutch firm ASML has carved out a key niche in the supply chain.... By Toby Sterling and Nathan Vifflin AMSTERDAM, Jan 27 (Reuters) - As artificial intelligence firms jostle for the Nvidia chips needed to power the AI boom, Dutch firm ASML has carved out a key niche… [+3601 chars]
